name: Acoustic Violin
description: This acoustic violin features a high-quality spruce top and maple back, providing a warm and resonant sound. Ideal for both classical and folk musicians, it includes a bow and a hard case.

name: Modern Violin
description: A modern violin with a sleek design and contemporary construction. It boasts a carbon fiber neck and a precision-engineered bridge, offering excellent sound projection and playability. Comes with a padded case.

name: Classic Violin
description: This classic violin features traditional craftsmanship with a hand-carved spruce top and maple back. Known for its rich, full-bodied tone, it's perfect for advanced players and orchestras. Includes a premium bow and case.

name: Fiddle
description: A versatile fiddle with a bright, lively tone suited for folk, bluegrass, and country music. This model has a durable build with an adjustable bridge and lightweight design. Includes a bow and gig bag.

name: Bass Violin
description: The bass violin offers a deep, resonant sound, perfect for orchestral and solo performances. With a large body and extended range, itâ€™s made from premium woods and includes a high-quality bow and a custom case.

name: Cello
description: This cello is crafted for professional musicians, featuring a solid spruce top and maple back with a deep, rich sound. It includes a deluxe bow and a sturdy case, designed for both performance and durability.
